>>> nopackage
import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Println(`Hello, world`)
}

<<< nopackage-error
Run: exit status 1

<<< nopackage
main.go:1:1: expected 'package', found 'import'

exit status 1

>>> noimport
package main

func main() {
	fmt.Println(`Hello, world`)
}

<<< noimport-error
Run: exit status 1

<<< noimport
# play.local
./main.go:4:2: undefined: fmt

exit status 1
